ygData.subject: Building cantera on linux Debian 3.1 r0 (sarge)
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi Michael Tank you very much for your help. I did implement your suggestions and run again make , after make clean and configure commands, and no error

Hi Michael

Tank you very much for your help. I did implement your suggestions and
run again 'make', after 'make clean' and 'configure' commands, and no
error appers for them and I checked that the new python (python2.4)
was correctly adopted by these script files. However I didn't have yet
success to run 'make install'. Below I copied and pasted the output of
'make install' command. Could you or somebody help me?

Tank in advace for all

Wladimyr




=====================================================
root@geitt4:/home/wladimyr/usr/src/cantera-1.6.0/cantera-1.6.0# make

--- oeviberlin <michael.oevermann@...> escreveu:

> Hi Wladimyr,
> 
> I had the same problem with my Debian
> (testing/unstable) box. I was
> able to compile (make), install (make install), and
> test (make test)
> Cantera without any problems after installing and
> using python2.4 (the
> default on my system was 2.3). Make sure you 
> have python2.4-numarray (and python2.4-numarray-ext)
> as well.
> Furthermore, I set 
> PYTHON_CMD=${PYTHON_CMD:="/usr/bin/python2.4"}
> in the configure script.
> 
> However, 
> 
> Good luck
> 
> Michael
> 
> 
> 
> --- In cantera@yahoogroups.com, "wladimyrmd"
> <wladimyrmd@y...> wrote:
> > Hello David
> > 
> > First of all I want sent a big congratulation for
> your initiative to
> > make available this wonderful package.
> > 
> > However, I have a problem. I have not troubles to
> compile cantera
> > 1.6.0, but both to make the test (make test) as
> weel as to install (#
> > make install) I did find troubles. Bellow you can
> find configure, make
> > test and make install outputs (copy&paste from
> terminal) as weel as
> > the config.h file already modified as suggested by
> Osman
> >
> (http://groups.yahoo.com/group/cantera/message/871).
> My machine is a
> > AMD686 XP 2200 SMP with Debian 3.1 r0 (sarge)
> installed. The F90
> > compiles is gfortran-4.0 from debian site. Could
> you help me? 
> > 
> > Please, tell me if you need aditional
> informations.
> > 
> > Tanks in advance for any help, if possible!
